data.name: Wild Runs
data.detailed_description: Wild Runs is a 2D platformer enhanced with 3D graphics and stylised production, the game consists of 9 levels consecutively getting harder and harder to prove your mettle beat level 9 and prove you are the Wild Runner. Levels come from vast lush fields, snowy hilltops, to deep mines and dry rocky landscapes. All the adventure and fights to then finally prove yourself to the distress of the land, defeat it to claim your title as the Wild Runner.
data.about_the_game: Wild Runs is a 2D platformer enhanced with 3D graphics and stylised production, the game consists of 9 levels consecutively getting harder and harder to prove your mettle beat level 9 and prove you are the Wild Runner. Levels come from vast lush fields, snowy hilltops, to deep mines and dry rocky landscapes. All the adventure and fights to then finally prove yourself to the distress of the land, defeat it to claim your title as the Wild Runner.
data.short_description: Wild Runs is a 2D platformer enhanced with 3D graphics and stylised production, the game consists of 9 levels consecutively getting harder and harder to prove your mettle beat level 9 and prove you are the Wild Runner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Wild Runs is made by Akaansh Ajit, part of FINAL games Limited.
